TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IWebActionable

summary.span: 启用 控件或其他服务器控件以包含谓词集合。

span.span: Enables controls or other server controls to contain collections of verbs.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在谓词控件是用户可以执行用户界面 (UI) 中的操作。A verb in controls is an action that a user can carry out in the user interface (UI). 通常情况下，谓词由一个可单击的控件，例如按钮、 链接或菜单项在 UI 中表示。Typically, a verb is represented in the UI by a clickable control such as a button, a link, or a menu item. Web 部件控件集提供了默认情况下可用的标准谓词控件和其他服务器控件 （如自定义，ASP.NET 和用户控件） 的工作方式类似控制中放入时区域。The Web Parts control set provides standard verbs that are available by default to controls and other server controls (such as custom, ASP.NET, and user controls) that can act like controls when placed in zones. 标准谓词包括关闭、 最小化、 还原、 删除、 编辑和导出。Standard verbs include close, minimize, restore, delete, edit, and export. 此外可以创建自定义谓词，以用于和服务器控件。You can also create custom verbs for use with and server controls. 接口，使用其属性，可让您将自定义谓词集成到您的控件的方法。The interface, with its property, gives you a way to integrate custom verbs into your controls. 类实现接口并实现其单一属性。The class implements the interface and implements its single property. 若要将自定义谓词添加到继承的控件类，必须重写属性，将自定义谓词添加到一个集合，并返回集合。To add custom verbs to a control that inherits from the class, you must override the property, add custom verbs to a collection, and return the collection. 所引用的集合属性包含仅自定义谓词; 此集合中不包括标准谓词。The collection referenced by the property contains only custom verbs; standard verbs are not included in this collection. 默认返回值中的属性控件是`null`，因为默认情况下不有任何自定义谓词集合中。The default return value of the property in a control is `null`, because by default there are no custom verbs in the collection. 将自定义谓词添加到服务器控件不控件需要一个额外步骤。Adding custom verbs to server controls that are not controls requires one extra step. 在这些情况下，控件还必须实现接口并实现属性。In those cases, the controls must also implement the interface and implement the property. 添加到自定义谓词后集合中，将自动设置该 Web 部件控件处理创建和呈现的自定义的谓词所需的其他步骤。After you have added custom verbs to the collection, the Web Parts control set automatically handles the other steps necessary to create and render the custom verbs. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示了如何简单实现 接口。The following code example demonstrates a simple implementation of the interface. 代码示例的第一部分演示如何在用户控件中实现该接口。The first part of the code example shows how the interface is implemented in a user control. 用户控件实现通过创建两个自定义谓词并定义当用户单击任一谓词时调用的方法的属性。The user control implements the property by creating two custom verbs and defining a method that is called when a user clicks either of the verbs. 为简单起见，相同的方法用于这两个谓词。For simplicity, the same method is used for both verbs. 此方法将更新名为的属性的值`VerbCounterClicks`。The method updates the value of a property named `VerbCounterClicks`. 代码`Page_Load`方法访问要显示的自定义谓词的总计数，集合中的控件的属性。The code for the `Page_Load` method accesses the property of the control to display the total count of custom verbs in the collection. 此计数不包括标准 Web 部件谓词。This count does not include the standard Web Parts verbs. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此示例具有一个接受用户输入的文本框，这是一个潜在的安全威胁。This example has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 默认情况下，ASP.NET 网页验证用户输入是否不包含脚本或 HTML 元素。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_IWebActionable_Overview#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_IWebActionable_Overview/CS/usercontrolverbcs.ascx#2)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_IWebActionable_Overview#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_IWebActionable_Overview/VB/usercontrolverbvb.ascx#2)] 代码示例的第二部分是一个.aspx 页面，承载用户控件。The second part of the code example is an .aspx page that hosts the user control. 因为在中引用该控件控件，在 ASP.NET 包装中的用户控件的运行时控件，并将其视为控件。Because the control is referenced in a control, at run time ASP.NET wraps the user control in a control and treats it as a control. 加载浏览器中的页面后，请注意底部的控件的标签会显示多少自定义谓词中引用的集合是属性。After you load the page in a browser, notice that the label at the bottom of the control displays how many custom verbs are in the collection referenced by the property. 另请注意，是否您单击谓词菜单的控件中，并单击任一个谓词，另一个标签会出现显示已单击的自定义谓词总次数。Also note that if you click the verbs menu in the control, and click either of the verbs, another label appears showing the total number of times the custom verbs have been clicked. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_IWebActionable_Overview#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_IWebActionable_Overview/CS/usercontrolverbhostcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_IWebActionable_Overview#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_IWebActionable_Overview/VB/usercontrolverbhostvb.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Verbs As WebPartVerbCollection

summary.span: 获取对自定义 对象的集合的引用。

span.span: Gets a reference to a collection of custom objects.

value.span: 包含自定义 对象的 。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性引用自定义谓词的集合 （如果有） 添加到的标头中的谓词菜单或其他服务器控件。The property references a collection of custom verbs (if any) that are added to a verbs menu in the header of a or other server control. 集合不包含引用标准随附的 Web 部件控件的对象设置，如， ， ， ，或。The collection does not contain references to the standard objects provided with the Web Parts control set, such as , , , , or . 开发人员想要添加到自定义的自定义谓词控制派生类可以只需重写属性的类实现。Developers who want to add custom verbs to a custom control that derives from the class can simply override the property that the class implements. 想要将自定义谓词添加到用户控件或不是一个自定义控件开发人员控件，必须实现接口的实现，从而属性。Developers who want to add custom verbs to a user control, or a custom control that is not a control, must implement the interface by providing an implementation of the property. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何将用户控件中实现的属性。The following code example demonstrates the use of the property as implemented in a user control. 可以在的示例部分中找到有关此代码示例的完整代码类概述主题。The full code for this code example can be found in the Example section of the class overview topic. 代码示例的以下部分演示了一个自定义实现的用户控件内的属性。The following portion of the code example demonstrates a custom implementation of the property within a user control. [!code-csharp[WebParts_IWebActionable_Overview#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_IWebActionable_Overview/CS/usercontrolverbcs.ascx#3)] [!code-vb[WebParts_IWebActionable_Overview#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_IWebActionable_Overview/VB/usercontrolverbvb.ascx#3)]
